label: Telegram to Isaiah Bennett from Charleston County Council
description: Telegram from Charleston County Council to Isaiah Bennett announcing meeting with County Manager, the Director of the County Hospital and limiting to employees only in regards to alleged grievances.

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Telegram from Charleston County Council to Isaiah Bennett announcing meeting with County Manager, the Director of the County Hospital and limiting to employees only in regards to alleged grievances.

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value:
533P EST MAR 28 69 AA304
A CNA348 HH PDF CHARLESTON SOCAR 28 527P EST
ISIAH [ISAIAH] BENNETT
DIRECTOR NATL [national] ORGANIZING COMMITTEE OF HOSPITAL AND NURSING
HOME WORKERS 655 E BAY ST DLY 75 CTS CHARLESTON SOCAR
MEETING AS OUTLINED BY DIRECTOR OF COUNTY HOSPITAL
AND COUNTY MANAGER IN REFERENCE TO ALLEGED GRIEVANCES WITH
THE COUNTY HOSPITAL WILL BE HELD PURSUANT TO OFFICIAL NOTIFICATION
AS PLANNED AT 8PM CHARLESTON COUNTY HOSPITAL BOARD ROOM, THIS
MEETING TO BE CONDUCTED BY THE COUNTY MANAGER AND DIRECTOR
OF THE HOSPITAL IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE POLICIES OF CHARLESTON
COUNTY COUNCIL APPLICABLE TO ALL COUNTY EMPLOYEES. THIS MEETING
LIMITED TO 8 EMPLOYEES OF THE CHARLESTON COUNTY HOSPITAL
ONLY
CHARLSTON [sic] COUNTY COUNCIL
